text:
As of 2024-12-31, HSBC reported:
- Total assets: 3.02 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 284.51 billion USD
- Total debt: 242.35 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 184.97 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 172.59 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2023-12-31, HSBC reported:
- Total assets: 3.04 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 299.57 billion USD
- Total debt: 235.16 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 185.33 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 172.84 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2022-12-31, HSBC reported:
- Total assets: 2.95 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 350.05 billion USD
- Total debt: 204.24 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 177.83 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 166.41 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2021-12-31, HSBC reported:
- Total assets: 2.96 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 422.44 billion USD
- Total debt: 223.64 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 198.25 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 177.63 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2020-12-31, HSBC reported:
- Total assets: not available
- Cash and cash equivalents: not available
- Total debt: not available
- Common stock equity: not available
- Tangible book value: not available
- Net debt: not available
